nodes.text: Desiraye Dusat was a male Human bounty hunter living during the Galactic War. Following the Battle of Rishi, he was part of Darth Marr's force that traveled to Yavin 4 and established the anti-Revanite coalition along with Republic forces under Satele Shan.

Desiraye Dusat appears as a Bounty Hunter gear vendor in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014. He was later removed during a gear system restructuring.
